definitions.definition: Characterized by or constituting (any kind of) irony .
examples: It's somewhat ironic to have a wave of smog right on Earth Day.
It's ironic that we are eating a sandwich in Sandwich, Massachusetts.

definitions.definition: Acting in an unserious and teasing manner.
examples: Don't take it personally. We're just being ironic .

definitions.definition: Done in an insincere and mocking manner; satirical .
examples: You should assume that everything this guy posts is ironic .

main_definition: ( of a situation ) Characterized by or constituting (any kind of) irony .
secondary_definitions: ( preceded with " being " ) Acting in an unserious and teasing manner.
( of a statement, action, etc. ) Done in an insincere and mocking manner; satirical .
